Le yimithetho yePalamente kaRhulumente kazwe-lonke nezabamaphondo. Uwiso-mthetho lweNtshona Koloni nolukazwe-lonke ludweliswa apha ngokweminyaka.
Qwalasela: Olu ayilo luhlu lugqibeleleyo lwalo lonke uwiso-mthetho. Ukuze ufikelele kwizintlu ezipheleleyo, nceda utyelele iwebsite kaRhulumente woMzantsi Afrika Enikezela Ngolwazi kunye nePolity.org.za
